resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107651</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107651</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206695</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Last Days of a President: Films of McKinley and the Pan-American Exposition, 1901</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die letzten Tage eines Präsidenten: Filme 
von McKinley und Wanne-Amerikanischen von Exposition, 1901</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les derniers jours d'un président : Films 
de McKinley et d'Exposition Casserole-Américain, 1901</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os últimos dias de um presidente: 
Películas de McKinley e da Exposição Bandeja-Americana, 1901</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli ultimi giorni di un presidente: 
Pellicole di McKinley e dell'Exposition Vaschetta-Americana, 
1901</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι τελευταίες ημέρες ενός Προέδρου: Ταινίες 
McKinley και της παναμερικανικής έκθεσης, 1901</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los días pasados de un presidente: 
Películas de McKinley y de la Exposition Cacerola-Americana, 
1901</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides 28 films that include footage of the Pan-American Exposition in Buffalo, President McKinley at his second inauguration, and McKinley's funeral. Two brief essays recall the politics and status of the U.S. at the turn of the century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt 28 Filme zur Verfügung, die Gesamtlänge 
der Wanne-Amerikanischen Ausstellung im Büffel, Präsident McKinley 
an seiner zweiten Einweihung und am Begräbnis McKinleys 
einschließen. Zwei kurze Versuche erinnern an die Politik und 
den Status der VEREINIGTEN STAATEN an der Jahrhundertwende.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit 28 films qui incluent la longueur de 
l'exposition Casserole-Américaine à Buffalo, le Président McKinley 
à sa deuxième inauguration, et à enterrement de McKinley. 
Deux brefs essais rappellent la politique et le mode des 
ETATS-UNIS à la fin du siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece 28 películas que incluem o footage da 
exposição Bandeja-Americana no búfalo, presidente McKinley em seu 
segundo inauguration, e em funeral de McKinley. Dois essays 
breves recordam a política e o status dos ESTADOS UNIDOS na volta do 
século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce 28 pellicole che includono il metraggio 
dell'esposizione Vaschetta-Americana in Buffalo, il presidente 
McKinley alla sua seconda inaugurazione ed al funerale del McKinley. 
Due brevi saggi ricordano la politica e la condizione degli 
STATI UNITI alla fine del secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει 28 ταινίες που περιλαμβάνουν το μήκος σε 
πόδηα της παναμερικανικής έκθεσης στους βούβαλους, Πρόεδρος 
McKinley στη δεύτερη εγκαινίασή του, και την κηδεία 
McKinley's. Δύο συνοπτικά δοκίμια υπενθυμίζουν την 
πολιτική και τη θέση των ΗΠΑ στο γύρισμα του αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a 28 películas que incluyan la 
cantidad de la exposición Cacerola-Americana en el búfalo, 
presidente McKinley en su segunda inauguración, y el entierro de 
McKinley. Dos ensayos abreviados recuerdan la política y el 
estatus de los ESTADOS UNIDOS al final del siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206695</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107651</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-last-days-of-a-president-films-of-mckinley-and-the-pan-american-exposition-1901</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
